name: College Conquest
description:
Controls

-Arrow keys for movement

-Mouse for button clicking

-Full screen recommended

Known Errors/Bugs:

-Opening story speech freezes but still loads next scene

-Sound fuzzes during new scene load

-Keys and door collisions appear again if player exits the map

Sound dies and crackles during credits (Turn sound off recommended for credits)

Credits freeze and FPS drops (Skip credits recommended)

Things to do:

- Get hit by an Eagle just for the fun of it

- Land in the courtyard

- Find hidden register in the courtyard

-Walk into all the classrooms

-Find your way to the hidden server room with some help from an NPC

-Find the hidden keys

-Access the final room

-Role credits

Not supported by Microsoft Edge.
